overview.heading: Sterling Heights Virtual Office
overview.body: Secure a prestigious Sterling Heights business address without the fiscal burden of a physical office. With Opus VO, place your enterprise at the heart of Sterling Heights’ dynamic environment, while optimizing your budget. Need to seal a deal or impress a client? Our state-of-the-art conference rooms are primed to make an impact.  When you establish a virtual office in Sterling Heights via Opus VO, a dedicated live receptionist comes as standard. Acting as an integral part of your operation, we manage each client interaction with the brand integrity you’ve come to expect. Relinquish tedious administrative work to us, so you can concentrate on realizing your business goals.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Sterling Heights, Michigan even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Sterling Heights. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Michigan.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Sterling Heights virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Sterling Heights?
sections.body: Don’t overlook Sterling Heights—a city rich in opportunities and varied industries from tech to healthcare. Having a Sterling Heights location opens doors to crucial networking events and connections that can elevate your business to new heights.  Investing in a virtual office through Opus VO in Sterling Heights is not just savvy budgeting, it’s a bona fide business strategy. Ready to raise your game? Our exceptional virtual office services are standing by.  Opus VO Sterling Heights @ 13854 Lakeside Circle, Sterling Heights, MI 48313
